name: Bigfoot
description: Bigfoot is a large, hairy, ape-like creature that is said to inhabit the forests of North America. It is also known as Sasquatch.

name: Chupacabra
description: The Chupacabra is a creature that is said to attack and drink the blood of livestock, especially goats. It is often described as a reptilian creature with spikes along its back.

name: Mothman
description: The Mothman is a creature that is said to resemble a large, winged humanoid with glowing red eyes. It is often associated with disaster and tragedy.

name: Jersey Devil
description: The Jersey Devil is a creature that is said to resemble a kangaroo-like creature with bat wings, horns, and a forked tail. It is often associated with the Pine Barrens of New Jersey.

name: Wendigo
description: The Wendigo is a creature from Algonquian folklore that is said to be a malevolent spirit that possesses humans and drives them to cannibalism. It is often associated with the forests of the Great Lakes region.
